_comment: Storage Configuration - Select storage backend for campaign assets

local._comment: Local filesystem storage - default option, no cloud dependencies

s3._comment: Amazon S3 Configuration - Uncomment and fill in to use
s3._auth_note: Provide credentials here OR use IAM roles OR AWS CLI config

azure._comment: Azure Blob Storage Configuration - Uncomment and fill in to use
azure._alternative: Can use connection_string instead of account_name/account_key

gcs._comment: Google Cloud Storage Configuration - Uncomment and fill in to use
gcs._auth_note: Provide credentials_path OR use Application Default Credentials
